mapper.sql: select r.result_id, r.assay_no, r.result_no, r.sample_no, Round(r.sample_volume,3) sample_volume, r.device_no, r.assay_item, Round(r.result_concentration,3) result_concentration, r.result_abs, r.result_date, r.result_time, r.curve_k0, r.curve_k1, r.curve_id, r.create_by, r.create_time, r.update_by, r.update_time, (case when r.assay_type =1 then sa.item_name + convert(varchar(10),r.sample_post) else sa.item_name end) as assay_type, t.item_name, s.sample_id,s.sample_name, w.works_id,w.works_name,w.works_no from z_assay_result r left join sys_assay_item t on t.assay_item = r.assay_item left join sys_assay_sample sa on r.assay_type = sa.assay_type left join z_assay_sample s on s.sample_no = r.sample_no and s.assay_no = r.assay_no left join biz_water_work w on s.work_no = w.works_no
